LanguageData.MHC_EnergyNeedDesc: Energy is the amount of retained charge in the unit. If it is hits zero, the unit will enter an inefficient low-power mode. If charge is not restored, hardware will eventually critically malfunction, and the unit will cease functioning.
LanguageData.MHC_ImprisonedDroneWarning: Drones can not be interacted with. Use surgeries to reprogram or shut down.
LanguageData.MHC_EnslavedDroneAlert: Drones should not be slaves! You are suffering a free error each tick. Immediately reprogram or eliminate this drone.
